name: Open The Door (itch)
description: Open The Door Made by Daniel Ackroyd [Goal] To baby-sit for a cat for a day. Look after the cat by following the text prompts until the cat want's to go outside. [Controls] W - Move forward A - Move Left S - Move backward D - Move Right Spacebar = Jump Click Left Mouse-Button = Interact Hold Left Mouse-Button = Drag Object [Interactables] Light Switches Doors Kitchen sink tap
